attributes.title: The worst app ever🤢
attributes.review: This app is making my phone glitch & I don’t appreciate it at all this orange man is not only ruining America he is messing up technology too I’m so disappointed in him.🤦🏽‍♂️🙄

attributes.title: Terrible app 🍊 🛑
attributes.review: This app is as terrible, not only did it take forever to download, it also had a bunch of fake news and communism. And the app is inciting violence and racism.

attributes.title: Trump
attributes.review: Trump is the worst. The app is laggy. And he is going to ban TikTok. Like what that is the most used platform so this makes no sense. He is going to get so much hate for this. He is going down.

attributes.title: Worst app ever🍊
attributes.review: This app took weeks to download. And I’m disappointed🤩because this is the best ✨racist✨cheeto🤩 president🧚🏽‍♀️ever🤩. The app brought so many ✨shimering✨ and ✨timbering✨viruses on my phone 🤩that I had to delete it🧚🏽‍♀️🍊💩

attributes.title: IF I COULD GIVE 0 STARS, I WOULD
attributes.review: First of all, the man running the app is very stupid and brainless. 2, the app is awful and I suggest never to download. They cheat you out your money, the app it self is FAIRLY hard to use. I AM DISGUSTED!!!

attributes.title: I hate this app
attributes.review: Donald Trump is a horrible person I thought this app would shed some light on him but it doesn’t he is still a horrible person

attributes.title: This app is terrible
attributes.review: This app is FULL of bugs. It is complete garbage. I was looking for reasons to vote for trump again, however could not find any

attributes.title: Glitching
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support Trump and the app glitches uncontrollably it presses random things and exit me out of the app constantly. Also the app called me the N-word.

attributes.title: A terrible app
attributes.review: The app glitches so much that I don’t even want to give it one star. The app barely works and who even likes trump anyways.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: The app legit took HOURS just to download. This isn’t a problem just for me, everyone is having this same issue. Worst app on the App Store. What a joke.
